title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for P'(k)=0

1 point is earned for k=400

1 point is earned for answer

1 point is earned for justification

Let P(k) be the profit for a cable of length k. P'( k )=120− 6  k  =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@437A@ when k=400.

This is the only critical point for P, and P' changes from positive to negative at k=400. Therefore, the maximum profit is P(400)=16,000 dollars.
